Vision of Death.name: Vision of Death
Vision of Death.fullText:
Infernal Eye Attack 11Vision of Death

You open your foe’s mind to the future and allow your enemy to see how death will claim it.

Encounter        Augmentable, Fear, Implement, Psionic, Psychic
Immediate Interrupt      Close burst 10

Trigger: An enemy in the burst is hit by an attack

Target: The triggering enemy

Attack: Charisma, Intelligence, or Wisdom vs. Will

Hit: 1d10 + Charisma, Intelligence Wisdom modifier psychic damage.

Augment 2

  Effect: Until the end of your next turn, the target is considered bloodied for all effects.


Published in Player's Handbook Races: Tiefling, page(s) 24.
Vision of Death.flavor: You open your foe’s mind to the future and allow your enemy to see how death will claim it.
Vision of Death.range:
Close burst 10

Trigger: An enemy in the burst is hit by an attack

Target: The triggering enemy

Attack: Charisma, Intelligence, or Wisdom vs. Will

Hit: 1d10 + Charisma, Intelligence Wisdom modifier psychic damage.

Augment 2

Vision of Death.effect: Until the end of your next turn, the target is considered bloodied for all effects.

Prescient Thought.name: Prescient Thought
Prescient Thought.fullText:
Infernal Eye Utility 12Prescient Thought

You gain a momentary glimpse of future failure and subtly guide your companion’s mind toward a better fate.

Daily        Psionic
Immediate Interrupt      Close burst 10

Trigger: An ally in the burst misses with an attack or fails a skill check

Effect: The ally gains a power bonus to the attack roll or skill check equal to your Charisma, Intelligence, or Wisdom modifier.


Published in Player's Handbook Races: Tiefling, page(s) 24.
Prescient Thought.flavor: You gain a momentary glimpse of future failure and subtly guide your companion’s mind toward a better fate.
Prescient Thought.range:
Close burst 10

Trigger: An ally in the burst misses with an attack or fails a skill check

Effect: The ally gains a power bonus to the attack roll or skill check equal to your Charisma, Intelligence, or Wisdom modifier.
Prescient Thought.trigger: An ally in the burst misses with an attack or fails a skill check
Prescient Thought.effect: The ally gains a power bonus to the attack roll or skill check equal to your Charisma, Intelligence, or Wisdom modifier.

Hellfire Gaze.name: Hellfire Gaze
Hellfire Gaze.fullText:
Infernal Eye Attack 20Hellfire Gaze

Enemies who fall beneath the gaze of your infernal eye feel hellfire burning in their souls and feeding upon their sins.

Daily        Fear, Fire, Psionic, Psychic
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: Until the end of the encounter, at the start of each of your turns, choose one enemy that you can see within 5 squares. That enemy takes fire and psychic damage equal to 5 + your Charisma, Intelligence, or Wisdom modifier and a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the start of your next turn.


Revision (1/7/2010)
Effect text revised per Mike Donais to read: Until the end of the encounter, at the start of each of your turns, choose one enemy that you can see within 5 squares. That enemy takes fire and psychic damage equal to 5 + your Charisma, Intelligence, or Wisdom modifier and a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the start of your next turn.

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Tiefling, page(s) 24.
